item.title: Solved by awesome RaZoR36
item.dc:creator: @holy_wtf holy wtf
item.description:
@holy_wtf wrote:

[quote=“RaZoR36, post:2, topic:279393”]in player.java search your old home coords that you wanna change, put your new ones in all of the old ones places

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; that is home area and die is in client.java and search for something like this

ApplyDead(); teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; but replace the #### with ur coords

Hope i helped[/quote]

ty hommie you da best

Read full topic

item.title: Solved by awesome RaZoR36
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

in player.java search your old home coords that you wanna change, put your new ones in all of the old ones places

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; that is home area and die is in client.java and search for something like this

ApplyDead(); teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; but replace the #### with ur coords

Hope i helped
